creator: Kontist GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Kontist takes the guesswork out of freelance finances, starting with taxes and VAT.

FEATURES
- Quick, paperless account opening process
- Timely notifications about new transactions
- Income tax and VAT calculated and saved automatically on each new invoice
- Easily check your account overview and access your transactions anytime
- Effortless integration with Debitoor for your accounting needs


SECURITY
Kontist, in partnership with the BaFin regulated SolarisBank AG, is committed to the safety and security of your data. Your deposits are secured by the European Deposit Fund and are safe up to 100.000 €, the standard for all European credit institutions.

ABOUT US
Kontist is built by freelancers for freelancers.

We believe freelancers will shape the future of work, challenging corporate structures, embracing individuality, and building successful businesses. Today the self-employed don’t get the help they need, in particular when it comes to the complexity of their finances. Kontist provides the banking services freelancers deserve.

We always love to hear feedback, ideas, and questions. You can reach us at feedback@kontist.com
descriptionShort: Banking for freelancers and the self- employed

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Split: It’s now super easy to split an outgoing transaction and assign different tax rates and payment types, e.g. VAT and Tax payment, leading to an accurate tax saving.

You like Kontist? Review us on Google Play.

title: Kontist – Banking for freelancers & sole traders

creator: Kontist GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Kontist takes the guesswork out of freelance finances, starting with taxes and VAT.

FEATURES
- Quick, paperless account opening process
- Timely notifications about new transactions
- Income tax and VAT calculated and saved automatically on each new invoice
- Easily check your account overview and access your transactions anytime
- Effortless integration with Debitoor for your accounting needs

Kontist, in partnership with the BaFin regulated SolarisBank AG, is committed to the safety and security of your data. Your deposits are secured by the European Deposit Fund and are safe up to 100.000 €, the standard for all European credit institutions.

title: Kontist – Banking for freelancers & sole traders

creator: Kontist GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Kontist takes the guesswork out of freelance finances, starting with taxes and VAT.

FEATURES
- Quick, paperless account opening process
- Timely notifications about new transactions
- Income tax and VAT calculated and saved automatically on each new invoice
- Easily check your account overview and access your transactions anytime
- Effortless integration with Debitoor for your accounting needs


SECURITY
Kontist, in partnership with the BaFin regulated SolarisBank AG, is committed to the safety and security of your data. Your deposits are secured by the European Deposit Fund and are safe up to 100.000 €, the standard for all European credit institutions.

ABOUT US
Kontist is built by freelancers for freelancers.

We believe freelancers will shape the future of work, challenging corporate structures, embracing individuality, and building successful businesses. Today the self-employed don’t get the help they need, in particular when it comes to the complexity of their finances. Kontist provides the banking services freelancers deserve.

We always love to hear feedback, ideas, and questions. You can reach us at feedback@kontist.com
descriptionShort: Banking for freelancers and the self- employed

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now filter for transactions with missing invoices for your Tax or VAT declaration.

- Easily check your account overview and access your transactions anytime
- Effortless integration with Debitoor for your accounting needs


SECURITY
Kontist, in partnership with the BaFin regulated SolarisBank AG, is committed to the safety and security of your data. Your deposits are secured by the European Deposit Fund and are safe up to 100.000 €, the standard for all European credit institutions.

ABOUT US
Kontist is built by freelancers for freelancers.

We believe freelancers will shape the future of work, challenging corporate structures, embracing individuality, and building successful businesses. Today the self-employed don’t get the help they need, in particular when it comes to the complexity of their finances. Kontist provides the banking services freelancers deserve.

We always love to hear feedback, ideas, and questions. You can reach us at feedback@kontist.com
